     This is the work the Lord wants us to do. Cannot you think of enough to praise the Lord for? Cannot you praise Him because He died for you, because He has spared you for so long, because you have His Word which is so full of precious promises? He offers you the bread of life. He says, "The words that I speak unto you, they are spirit and they are life" [John 6:63]. Eat His Word, search it, dig deep for the hidden treasure.
